name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red color inspired by the rossoCorsa shade, Circuit stands out among its peers. Its body is adorned with a laser screen, allowing it to display intricate waveforms and data with precision. The classic box-shaped design gives Circuit a nostalgic charm while incorporating modern technology. Equipped with agile cat-like buttons and sturdy arms and legs, Circuit is both efficient and versatile.
